name: agoraphobia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
fear of going outside and being in public places or of being in a situation from which it might be difficult to escape or in which help might not be available: Suffering from agoraphobia, she's afraid to even step outside her home. It is estimated that approximately 500,000 adults in Great Britian suffer from agoraphobia to some extent. Compare
claustrophobia
